name: Pizza time (coolgamedev)
description:
You wake up at night hungry, craving a delicious Pizza. There is something wrong with the Pizza. (this games was made for the What A Jam May 2021 and also I submitted this WAY to late because I tried to make a game for this jam 3 TIMES so its very lacking in polish but hey, at least there's a game)

Controls:

press space to make a new pizza (you need to make 5 to beat the game)

that's it
